catalog_info.title: Probability Theory and Applications II
catalog_info.notes: A weekly 90-minute lab. Offered jointly with the School of Public Health as BIO250.
catalog_info.description: A foundational course in measure theoretic probability. Topics include measure theory, Lebesgue integration, product measure and Fubini's Theorem, Radon-Nikodym derivatives, conditional probability, conditional expectation, limit theorems on sequences of random variables, stochastic processes, and weak convergence.
